alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 3:55PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MOBILE AND WEST CENTRAL BALDWIN COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Stockton to 6 miles northwest of Stapleton to Fairhope. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Daphne, Fairhope, Saraland, Bay Minette, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Spanish Fort, Creola, Stockton, Stapleton, Axis, I65 And I165, and I65 And AL 225. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland
